plurals.name: offline_notification_count
plurals.item: You have 1 offline product waiting to be contributed to Open Food Facts
You have %d offline products waiting to be contributed to Open Food Facts

resources.string: Produktu hau ez dago osatuta. Ondorioz, ezin izan dugu alergenoen egiaztapena egin.
Offline gehitutako produktuak hemen agertuko dira
Erabiltzailea/pasahitza aldatu egin da, eguneratu informazioa mesedez
Click here to donate to Open Food Facts
Substances or products causing allergies or intolerances :
Ingredients that may be from palm oil :
Learn more about the nutrient levels
Ezin izan dugu Internetera sartu. Konektatzeko arazoak al dituzu?
Sarea eskuragarri dagoenean igoko da irudia
Eskaneatu duzun produktua ez dago Open Food Facts datu-basean oraindik. Gehitu ezazu.
Ziur zaude zirriborro hau ezabatu nahi duzula?
Produktu hau lokalki gordea dago, \"Offline edizioa\" menuan edita dezakezu
Ikusi produktu hau Open Food Facts-en:

Zure alergien informazioa ez da inoiz Open Food Facts-en zerbitzarira bidaliko. Horrez gain, kontuz ibili agian produktuaren datuak ez baitira zehatzak, eta detekzioa agian ez da %100 zehatza, beraz egiaztatu zure kabuz mesedez!
You can scan products when you\'re offline to add them to Open Food Facts later. All the products you scan will appear here, and you\'ll be able to send them using the button below.
Camera permission is needed to scan barcodes and take pictures.
Your device does not have a camera. You won\'t be able to scan any barcode.
Please activate permission in the settings
You need to download some data to get this functionality working. Please activate internet connection.
The password needs to be at least 6 characters long.
This option if selected will start scan when app is opened.
Quickly scan products in a supermarket to see which ones are not in the database.
Are you enjoying your experience with Open Food Facts?
We\'re sorry to hear that! Could you tell us what happened?
Great! Let others know what you think of this app!
Do you want to clear all your scan history?
Kanpo biltegiratzean idazteko baimena behar da historiala esportatzeko.
Choose your preferred energy units for the nutrition table
Choose your preferred volume units for the nutrition table
You can sign-in or create an account to keep your contributions
Oh no, we don’t have any product in this category, can you add one?
Oh no, we don’t have any products with this allergen, can you add one?
Oh no, we don’t have any products with this label, can you add one?
Oh no, we don’t have any products with this additive, can you add one?
Oh no, we don’t have any products from this country, can you add one?
Oh no, we don’t have any products from this store, can you add one?
Oh no, we don’t have any products with this packaging, can you add one?
Oh no, we don’t have any products with this brand, can you add one?
We don’t have any incomplete products! Add a new product?
Oh no, we don’t have any products from this contributor, can you add one?
We haven\'t found any matching products.\nYou can try :
- broadening your search \n- scan and add it to Open Food Facts
Take a photo of the recycling instructions
Take a photo of the front
1. taldea - Prozesatu gabeko edo ahalik eta gutxien prozesatutako elikagaiak
Hegaldi modua gaituta dago, desgaitu hau jarraitzeko.
Sare konexioa behar da hau egiteko, ezarpenetan hau aldatu nahi duzu?
Upload new products using mobile data & WiFi
Upload new products using WiFi only
Upload on mobile data is disabled, please connect to WiFi or change this in preferences
Bring the Open Food Facts database to your language - no technical knowledge required
Your viewed product history will be listed here.\nThis history is for your eyes only and is stored locally.
Ziur al zaude saioa amaitu nahi duzula?
Pick a resolution for image upload
There is no Wikipedia page in your language yet.
Disable image loading when battery is low
Pictures without barcode cannot yet be added with the app. Please try the mobile web version.
Argazkiak gehitu nahi dituzu barra-kode honetan?
Products you added that need to be completed
Osatu behar diren produktuak, non zuk argazkiak atera dituzun
Osatu behar diren produktuak, non zuk informazioa gehitu duzun
Notification to show exported file\'s location
Offline contributions you need to send
Product added on %1$s at %2$s CET by %3$s
Last edit of product page on %1$s at %2$s CEST by %3$s
Show user contributions tab with products
Show all product photos submitted in a separate tab
This product is not yet complete. \nCan you add some details?
You seem offline. Add the product %s using the offline mode ?
The product %1$s you scanned does not exist yet in Open Food Facts. Can you add it?
No image for selected language. You can add a new one
Something went wrong while trying to add product ingredients
Unable to extract ingredients from image
Something went wrong while trying to add product nutrition facts
Carbohydrates can\'t be less than the sum of sugar and starch
Something went wrong while trying to add product details
Link of the official page of the product
Examples: EMB 53062, FR 62.448.034 CE, 84 R 20, 33 RECOLTANT 522, FSSL 10013011001409
Scan QR Code for product website
Please add at least one picture of this product before proceeding
Something went wrong while trying to add product photos
Do you want to save the product?
Something went wrong when adding the product
You appear to have no internet connection, images will be uploaded when network is available
No internet connection. Unable to extract ingredients
(Please take a photo of the ingredients to automatically extract them)
Keep the order, indicate the % when specified, separate with a comma or use -, use () for ingredients of an ingredient, surround allergens with _
Indicate ingredients from mentions like \'May contain traces of\', \'Made in a factory that also uses\', etc. \nExamples: Milk, Gluten, Nuts
Nutrition facts are not specified on the product.
(one photo is compulsory to add a new product)
(Add more pictures of the product. eg: recycling instructions, labels etc.)
Please sign in to edit a product.
Mesedez, hasi saioa edo erregistratu ideia hau erantzuteko.
Examples: 2 l, 250 g, 1 kg, 25 cl, 6 fl oz, 1 pound
%s is already present in the nutrition facts
The European Food Safety Authority (EFSA) has determined that some population groups have a high risk of consuming too much %1$s.
above dose with observed adverse effect (NOAEL)
This value is above 2000 kcal per 100g. Can you correct it ?
Value entered is more than given per serving size
Add nutrition facts to compute the Nutri-Score
Add a category to compute the Nutri-Score
Add nutrition facts and a category to compute the Nutri-Score
Help categorize products to compute the Nutri-Score
We could not download certain data. This may be due to a connection error.
Enables fast addition of products with fewer attributes
Enables crop action on new images

\"You\'ll be able to add product to this list by scanning products, dragging the product card up and tapping on \"I\'m eating this\". You\'ll also be able to add products to this list by searching them and clicking on the + button in the top right of the product page.\"
You\'ll be able to add products to this list by searching them and clicking on the + button in the top right of the product page.
Remove all the searches that you performed on this device
This product doesn\'t have any nutrition information on the packaging. If this has changed, you can edit the product.

You can delete a list by swiping it left.
Add nutrition facts to compute the Nutri-Score
The value should be numeric. Example: "1.5", "2,0"
The serving size value must be a positive value
Some nutrient values are not valid. Please, fix above fields with error marker
No additive data available for this product
No nutrient information available for this product

Click on the icons below to learn more about the product and to select what information you are interested in.
Tap on the image to zoom it, change it, crop it, rotate it and more…

Open Food Facts is an open database of more than %1$s food products (plus the ones you will contribute).
